com.ibm.ccl.soa.deploy.core
Class UnitDescriptor

java.lang.Object
  com.ibm.ccl.soa.deploy.core.UnitDescriptor
Direct Known Subclasses:
TopologyUnitDescriptor
public abstract class UnitDescriptor
extends java.lang.Object

This class is used to act as a descriptor to get the value of the unit itself. Provide an implementation of this class to create the unit and it's name.

See Also:
TopologyDiscoverer

referencesUnit

public abstract boolean referencesUnit(Unit unit)
Determines if a descriptor identifies the same Unit as a given Unit. Two units are the same if they would be represented by the same Unit in the same Topology.

Parameters:
unit - the unit to be compared to that described by the descriptor
Returns:
true if the units are the same unit; false if not or if not determinable

referencesUnit

public abstract boolean referencesUnit(UnitDescriptor descriptor)
Determines if a descriptor identifies the same Unit as that described by a second . Two units are the same if they would be represented by the same Unit in the same Topology.

Parameters:
unit - the unit to be compared to that described by the descriptor
Returns:
true if the units are the same unit; false if not or if not
